pinyin: Zui4 gao1 Ren2 min2 Fa3 yuan4

definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: It is the perfection and the supreme adornment of the justified soul.
sentences.chinese: 這是完善和最高人民法院裝飾品的理由靈魂。

sentences.english: Second, the Supreme Court should improve the judicial process of the final decision right to death penalty.
sentences.chinese: 其次，建議最高人民法院收回死刑覈准權。

sentences.english: Article 127 The Supreme People's Court is the highest judicial organ.
sentences.chinese: 第一百二十七條最高人民法院是最高審判機關。

sentences.english: She was called up to give evidence by the Supreme People's Court.
sentences.chinese: 最高人民法院傳她作證。

sentences.english: The supreme people's court ruled that she was not guilty.
sentences.chinese: 最高人民法院判她無罪。

sentences.english: Article 199 Death sentences shall be subject to approval by the Supreme People's Court.
sentences.chinese: 第一百九十九條死刑由最高人民法院覈准。

sentences.english: The case has been remitted to the supreme people's court.
sentences.chinese: 此案已提交最高人民法院審理。

pinyin: Zui4 gao1 Ren2 min2 Jian3 cha2 yuan4

definition: judgment (by a court of law)/to pass judgment on/to sentence
common plea/civil appeal (as opposed to criminal case)
Ministry of Justice (PRC etc)/Justice Department (USA etc)
